name: Diapers
description: Client is a divorced single mother with 4 children. Currently two young children are under her care ( F, 11y/o and F, 1y/o), while her two other children are under the care of her ex-husband. Client stays with her mother as well, and is the main breadwinner of the family. However, due to the nature of Client's job, there are months where her income is little, resulting in tight living expenses, adding on to her stressors as a single mother. As such temporary support with diapers and milk powder would help to alleviate some of her financial stressors.
specifications: Fair Price Baby Dry Tape (XL) High Absorbancy

contact.org: Allkin Family Service Centre @ Cheng San 445
contact.name: Nur Farisha

passiton.name: BW Generation tape diapers (Size M)
passiton.description:
We have 2 pkts of the above diapers. Please find product link here for reference: https://www.geriatriccare.asia/product/ultra-wrappers-medium-10-per-pack/

We are unable to cover delivery fees. Please arrange for own delivery.

name: Baby Cot
description: Family has 3 preschool children, with father as the sole breadwinner. Mother is currently pregnant with her 4th child and is due to give birth in a month. Financial income is limited as it is dependent on father's, while father also has to take no pay leave occasionally to help with caregiving duties when children fall sick. To prepare for upcoming birth, family needs a baby cot to ensure safe sleeping arrangements for newborn. It will greatly benefit them to save on financial expenses too. If you have any baby cot to bless, do contact me at 8940 7451! Thank you (:

name: Diapers
description:
OffSpring Diapers Pull Up 2XL

This family has four school-aged children and one toddler. They are a low-income family with both parents working hard to make ends meet and ensure their kids' needs are met. With no relatives to support them, they are on their own.

Given the current rise in living costs, maintaining their daily essentials is becoming increasingly difficult. Assistance with diapers would be greatly appreciated and would help ease their burden. Your support can make a meaningful difference in their lives.

passiton.name: BW Generation tape diapers (Size M)
passiton.description:

We are unable to cover delivery fees. Please arrange for own delivery.

name: Diapers
description: Family is a low income family with 7 kids. Mother is the main breadwinner while father is the caregiver. She usually earns enough for the family, and the family is on financial assistance as well. However, as mother has been sick this month and was even hospitalized (overwork), the family is experiecing financial difficulties (mum works as a sales person and if she does not work and earn commision, she does not earn enough for the family). Husband is trying to look for a part-time job, but that will take some time too. FSC has provided them with some emergency cash this month for their basic needs but they need some support for diapers. They have 2 young children still on diapers and it would be helpful if they can get 4 packets of L and XL diapers each for each child (any brand is fine). This should last them for 1 month plus till mother feels better and the family's financial situation stabilises a bit. It would be helpful if they can get a few tins of Lactogen 3 too as the current tins that they have can only last for a few more weeks. Thank you for supporting the family, please feel free to reach out to me through email should you require more information.

passiton.name: BW Generation tape diapers (Size M)
passiton.description:
We have 2 pkts of the above diapers. Please find product link here for reference: https://www.geriatriccare.asia/product/ultra-wrappers-medium-10-per-pack/

We are unable to cover delivery fees. Please arrange for own delivery.

name: Wheelchair
description: Mr. Sng requires a functional wheelchair to help him attend his appointments more easily. He experienced a severe fall in December 2023, which has rendered him unable to continue working as a security guard. Currently, he receives a monthly CPF payout of $400 and is using a walking frame. A wheelchair would significantly improve his mobility and overall well-being.

passiton.description: Full functioning wheelchair.
passiton.dimensions: HT fr handle 88cm.  Seat width 44cm Ht 43cm

name: Wheelchair
description:
Client, 55 years old has diabetes and kidney failure, she is permanently unfit for work. Due to her condition, she is unable to walk due to swollen limbs and fatigue. She would need a wheelchair for commuting in the neighborhood and to attend her medical appointments. Her current wheelchair is faulty. 

Her family has financial difficulties as her husband suffered stroke in 2023 and is unfit for work as well. Her eldest son is unemployed as he is waiting to be enlisted this year. Her youngest son is in Primary 6.

name: Wheelchair
description:
Elderly amputee man who lives alone requires mobility device (width cannot be more than 20 inch or 51cm) to ambulate within the house and reduce high fall risk. 

Ideally, a one-arm drive wheelchair would be fantastic. However it requires customisation by local supplier DNR wheels and costs $2.5-3k. If this is however out of your budget, a regular wheelchair would suffice. Thank you!

name: Wheelchair
description: Client is 48 years old, and she has 4 children who are currently still studying in secondary school and primary school. Client has a medical condition on both of her legs that has caused her to be permanently unfit for work. As client is currently not a senior citizen, it is often difficult for client to obtain assistance for her mobility issues. Due to client’s mobility issue, she has been relying solely on the wheelchair for her daily activities. Client shared that her wheelchair has broken down 2 weeks ago and a wheelchair is a necessity for client’s movement.
